def.name: Is not context medication topical diclofenac

operand.value: Patient is taking a proton pump inhibitor (

else.value: Patient is not taking a proton pump inhibitor or misoprostol.

expression.value: Proton pump inhibitors and misoprostol may reduce the risk of UGIB in patients receiving NSAIDs and warfarin.

then.value: Assess risk and take action if necessary.

else.value: Use only if benefit outweighs risk.

operand.value: Patient is 65 y/o or does have a history of upper gastrointestinal bleed ("

else.value: Patient is not 65 y/o and does not have a history of upper gastrointestinal bleed.

expression.value: Patients with a history of UGIB or peptic ulcer may have an increased risk of UGIB from this interaction. The extent to which older age is an independent risk factor for UGIB due to these interactions is not firmly established, but UGIB in general is known to increase with age.

then.value: Assess risk and take action if necessary.
Use only if benefit outweighs risk.

else.value: Assess risk and take action if necessary.

operand.value: Patient is concomitantly taking systemic corticosteroids (
), or high dose or multiple NSAIDs (

else.value: Patient is not concomitantly taking systemic corticosteroids, aldosterone antagonist, or high dose or multiple NSAIDs.

expression.value: Both corticosteroids and aldosterone antagonists have been shown to subsetantially increase the risk of UGIB in patients on NSAIDs, with relative risks of 12.8 and 11 respectively compared to a risk of 4.3 with NSAIDs alone (Masclee et al. Gastroenterology 2014; 147:784-92.)

then.value: Assess risk and take action if necessary.
Use only if benefit outweighs risk.

else.value: Assess risk and take action if necessary.
